translation:
Mr. João Agostinho da Silva, owner of the cloth that at the request of Your Excellency Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu was purchased, has come here to settle the matter definitively, as said citizen Abreu mentions in the enclosed letter, and I send him to the presence of Your Excellency.

The aforementioned citizen Abreu asks me to obtain from Your Excellency Your Excellency.
